dmca.title: [ABUSE] Legal Notice for copyright infringement by Angelknows.com hosted on your data
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Saturday, April 02, 2005 1:45 PM
To: Copyright Compliance
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Legal Notice for copyright infringement by
Angelknows.com hosted on your datacenter.]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----

For your review.
- --

The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html

- -------- Original Message --------

Lance Crosby, Esq.
Chief Operating Officer
1333 Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas, TX 75207
USA

Sub:Legal Notice for  Copyright Infringement for Purposes of Title 17,
Section 512, of The United States Code

Sir,
One of the sites www.http://angelknows.com/
<http://www.http://angelknows.com/> hosted on your data centre by Name
Servers:
~   ns1.pslmusic.com
~   ns2.pslmusic.com
owned by
AngelKnows,Inc
~   Jingliang Li (webmaster@angelknows.com
<mailto:webmaster@angelknows.com>)
~   +1.3153035594
~   Fax: +1.3153035598
~   220 Bassett St. Apt.2
~   Syracuse, NY 13210
~   US
It is an exact  replica of our site page by page including our personal
photos shown as owners at http://angelknows.com/wfteam.htm I am  owner of
the site www.womenfitness.net <http://www.womenfitness.net> for last five
years and the entire content is copyright.
I request you to immediately remove this site from your hosting in next
12 hrs otherwise you shall be severally and jointly held you responsible for
all claims that we shall be forced to file on your company for Copyright
Infringement for Purposes of Title 17, Section 512, of The United States
Code


Rohit Nayyar
Bar-at-law
On behalf of proprietor
Namita Nayyar
Proprietor
WWW.WOMENFITNESS.NET <http://www.WOMENFITNESS.NET>
E-25 New Agra
Agra
U.P.
India
